      • testGenerateVigenereTable

        public void testGenerateVigenereTable()
        Tests generateVigenereTable(). Tests by vaildating the values of all elements in the VigenereTable.

      • testGenerateKey

        public void testGenerateKey()
        Tests generateKey(). Checks negative values for keyLength are handled appropriately. Checks punctuation and case validation on input text is performed.

      • testEncrypt

        public void testEncrypt()
        Tests encrypt(). Checks permutations of keylength and keyword length are handled correctly. Checks expected encrypted string values are returned. Checks punctuation and case validation is performed on input text.

      • testDecrypt

        public void testDecrypt()
        Tests decrypt(). Checks permutations of keylength and keyword length are handled correctly. Checks expected decrypted string values are returned. Checks punctuation and case validation is performed on input text.

      • testShiftChar

        public void testShiftChar()
        Tests private method shiftChar(). Checks expected char values are returned from shifts from positive and negative shifts. Checks returned char values are kept in permitted char range. Checks positive and negative shifts greater than the range are handled.
